西半球: (にしはんきゅう) - western hemisphere; the Occident

西南日本: (せいなんにほん) - southwest Japan (southwest of the Itoigawa-Shizuoka Tectonic Line)
西南日本内帯: (せいなんにほんないたい) - area of southwestern Japan north of the Median Tectonic Line
西南日本外帯: (せいなんにほんがいたい) - area of southwestern Japan south of the Median Tectonic Line

西周: (せいしゅう) - Western Zhou (dynasty of China)
西国: (さいこく) - the western part of Japan (esp. Kyushu, but ranging as far east as Kinki); western nations (esp. India or Europe); 33 temples in the Kinki area containing a statue of Avalokitesvara; a pilgrimage of these temples
西国三十三所: (さいこくさんじゅうさんしょ) - 33 temples in the Kinki area containing a statue of Avalokitesvara
西国巡礼: (さいこくじゅんれい) - pilgrimage of the Saigoku-Sanjuusansho (33 temples in the Kinki region)
西土: (せいど) - western lands (China, India, etc.); the West
西域: (せいいき) - western regions of China

西壁: (せいへき) - west face; west wall
